doc_class_description: A Court of Appeal judgment is a higher court ruling that reviews decisions of lower courts, shaping legal precedent and protecting citizens’ rights.

latest_doc_d.description: Kammalgoda Mudalige Priyantha Hewasinghe Vs The Hon. Attorney General, before Hon. Amal Ranaraja, J.
latest_doc_d.parties: Kammalgoda Mudalige Priyantha Hewasinghe Vs The Hon. Attorney General,
latest_doc_d.keywords: Contradictions and omissions of witness testimony – Determining whether contradictions and omissions of testimonies are material to the case – Testimonies disputed by witnesses being supported by additional evidence from other witnesses and physical evidence
